summary: Victini, a legendary Pokémon, unable to leave the boundaries of its hometown, is targeted by a determined villager to restore the homelands of his ancestors.
cast: Sarah Natochenny|Eileen Stevens|Jason Griffith|James Carter Cathcart|J. Michael Tatum|Nana Mizuki|Leah Clark|Khristine Hvam|Bob Senkewicz|Lisa Ortiz|Bill Rogers|Michele Knotz|Eli James|Kayzie Rogers|Rodger Parsons|Erica Schroeder|Tom Wayland|Mao Daichi|Megumi Hayashibara|Inuko Inuyama|Satomi Ishihara|Unshô Ishizuka|Rica Matsumoto|Shin'ichirô Miki|Mamoru Miyano|Shôko Nakagawa|Hideki Takahashi|Shôsuke Tanihara|Takeshi Tsuruno|Kôichi Yamadera|Aoi Yûki|Ikue Ôtani
title: La Película Pokémon: Negro - Victini y Reshiram
